/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and beige, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. Their windows reflect the sunlight, adding a touch of brightness to the scene. The trees, lush and green, provide a natural contrast to the man-made structures. Power lines crisscross above the street, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees. The image is a beautiful blend of nature and architecture, capturing the essence of a sunny day in Beijing.
